definitions.definition: to experience difficulty and make a very great effort in order to do something:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] The dog had been struggling to get free of the wire noose.

definitions.definition: to move somewhere with great effort:
examples: He struggled along the rough road holding his son.

definitions.definition: to be in danger of failing or being defeated:
examples: After the first half, United were really struggling.

definitions.definition: a very difficult task that you can do only by making a great effort:
examples: It was a terrible struggle for him to accept her death.
